feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Analytics Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP Analytics Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Exporting Plan Data from SAC to SAP S/4HANA
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We want to export planning data from our SAC Model to S/4HANA and more specific, to ACDOCP. As we can see, there is only one export method available: Clean and Replace.

However, we do not wish to delete the existing records of ACDOCP. 

Is there any way, that we can export our data to ACDOCP without deleting any of the other records?

Thank you in advance for you help!

SAP Analytics Cloud

entry.title: SAP analytic Model disappeared
entry.content: We have a story based on two models. Today the story does not work. It says the models are not there. looked through activity log and could not find anything deleted. We have the model ID.  How to retrieve them and why did it happen?

entry.title: How to Load Exchange Rate Types from S/4 TCURR in SAC?
entry.content:
I am trying to create an exchange rate model using S/4 TCURR content in SAC. We load a view using OData Connection from  Datasphere.

Scenario:
- S/4

    - We have many exchange rate types in S/4 (> than 20)

    - TCURR-KURST (Types): For example: EUROX, M, (3-5 Budget rates) and so on...

- SAC:

    - rates: average and closing

    - categories: Actual, Budget, Planning, Forecast, Specific...

 

Rate Type

Rate Version

 

 

 

QUESTION:

- How to load the content in SAC? What is the technical approach to get this requirement done in SAC?

- Should we:

    - create more currency conversion models?

    - Filter only the relevant types for the planning process?

 

Thanks in advance for any input.

Carlos

entry.title: Is there a way to dynamically change the names and legends of measure items in SAC?
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Is there a way to dynamically change the names and legends of measure items in SAC?

For example, suppose you have a numerical item called measure and want to display that measure item as a line graph broken down by fiscal year.
You can display a legend on a line chart, but I want the legend to show the fiscal year, such as “measure(2020)” and “measure(2021)”.

I want to display the fiscal year in the parentheses. Is it possible to dynamically specify the fiscal year?
Dynamic means that when data for fiscal year 2025 is newly added, “measure(2025)” will be added without requiring any editing operations.

The image below represents the desired outcome.
The image display uses a calculated measure to create a numerical value field named “measure(2020)”, but this method cannot be considered dynamic.


If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.
If you need additional information, please let us know in the comments.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: SAC Application script multi selection in table onSelect script
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am trying to do multi selection of values which has to pass to filter the data in other widgets.
I wrote the below code in onSelect of table.

var select = Source_Obj.getSelections();
console.log(select);
if (select.length>0) {
var members = ArrayUtils.create(Type.string);
for (var i=0; i<select.length; i++) {
for (var dimen in select[i]) {
if (dimen===Dim) {
members[i] = select[i][dimen];
console.log(members[i]);
}
}
}
console.log("member are ... "+members.join("|"));
Target_Obj.getDataSource().setDimensionFilter("Country",members);
}

But multi selection ia happening only with Ctrl + selection. 
Is there any way to do this multi selection with out Ctrl key.
 
Can anyone please help me on this.

Thanks in advance...

entry.title: Adding calculated rows in SAP Analytics Cloud table for lightweight calculations
entry.content:
I am working on a P&L statement with several category trees. For example Expenses Category can include child-members such as: COGS, SG&A, and Depreciation & Amortization.

SAC has automatically summed up each category (tree) group.

In this case, I am trying to sum-up or subtract two (2) or more categories trees depending on the required calculation. My expectation is to display the calculated measure’s name e.g. Net Income and value below the used/existing measures. See example:

>Revenue

100

>Expenses

50

Net Income

50

Currently no values are been displayed only the formula cell references e.g. =A5-A6 or Sum (A5, A6). See attached the screenshots. Please note that (all) represents the totals of the entire column

The primary data is from an on-premise BW system and a flat file (blended data). SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) tenant is not using a planning license.

entry.title: Implementing a Dynamic YTD Filter Up to Yesterday in SAP Story
entry.content:
Hi all,

I want to set up a dynamic YTD filter in an SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) story that always goes up to the previous day. The goal is for the filter to automatically consider the current year, but have the end date update daily.

Important: On the first day of the month, the filter should show the last day of the previous month, not the current month’s first day

I tried to use the Offset  function for selecting the previous day but this didnt work when I try to Show YTD for the current year.

Best,

Moritz

entry.title: SAC Application : How to capture the selected value from a Table
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am trying to capture the selected value from a table. Right now i am using the below script which is capturing the entire row. 

var select = Source_Obj.getSelections();

console.log("selected dimension...");

console.log(select);

if (select.length > 0) {

var members = ArrayUtils.create(Type.string);

for (var i=0; i < select.length; i++) {

for (var dimension in select[i]) {

if (dimension === Dim) {

console.log("Passing dimension ..."+Dim);

members.push(select[i][dimension]);

}

 

}

}

Target_Obj.getDataSource().setDimensionFilter("Country",members);

}

 

When i am clicking on the country value "South Korea" it is capturing the entire row. 

Is there any way to capture exact value in the selected cell. I want to capture the selected cell value and filter the data in another widget based on this value. 

Can anyone of you please help me on this.
Thanks...

entry.title: Calculating Look Ahead in SAC Line Chart
entry.content:
Dear Experts, I have the requirement to show the below values in the line chart

1. YTD Forecast Values (Full year - Jan-Dec)

2. YTD Actuals Values (Till Prev month)

3. YTD Look Ahead (Till prev month it should take YTD Actuals and Remaining month as Forecast Values)

I have showed YTD Forecast by creating restricted account and choosing version as forecast and date as running total year to date. See the screenshot below

Now i am doing the same for Actuals, but system is showing the YTD Actuals till dec month whereas i want to show Actuals till current month only. How i can restrict my chart to show actuals till current month only?

 

lastly, i want to show Look ahead which will be YTD Actuals till Sep(Last month) and YTD forecast for remaining months of the year.

Appreciate if you can help on point 2 & point 3.

Br,

Rohit

entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

Can you please share me steps /Guide to create Acquire connection between SAC Vs SAP HANA On premise .

Steps I performed:

1. I have installed Cloud Connecter.

2. Installed SAP Analytics cloud Agent.

 

Regards.

entry.title: Impact on Teams When Team Creator Becomes Deleted User in SAC
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I have a question regarding user deletion behavior in SAP Analytics Cloud.

When a user is deleted and replaced by a "deleted user" placeholder, it is understood that folders or objects owned by that deleted user will be deleted after 90 days. However, I would like to clarify what happens in the following scenario:

- If the creator of a Team becomes a deleted user, will the Team itself or any related objects/folders also be deleted after 90 days, similar to how contents owned directly by the deleted user are handled?

I have searched the SAP Community but could not find any clear explanation or discussion about this case.

Could someone please share insights or official documentation regarding how SAC manages team ownership and deletion rules when the original team creator is deleted?

Thank you very much in advance for your support.

Best regards,

entry.title: Sending emails from SAC
entry.content: Hi, I am new in SAC and a business requirement  is to send an email (after pressing a button) to SAC users to inform  them they need to process some actions. Is this possible? If yes, can someone help me to write the script to send the email? (I don't find an API; I am using the optimized design story). Already thanks!

entry.title: SAP R Server is Being Phased Out
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm working with R visualizations in SAP Analytics Cloud, but I've run into an issue. Along with the following warning message:

"Deprecation Warning: SAP R server is being phased out.
We recommend creating R visualizations connected to your own R server or using custom widgets for more functionalities.
If you're using your own R server, ignore the message."

My R visualizations are no longer working, and they fail to load data entirely.

I'm looking for possible solutions, and in particular: Are there any recommended custom widgets (on GitHub or elsewhere) that can replace R-visualization widgets?

Any guidance, suggestions, or shared experiences would be greatly appreciated.

Would appreciate any guidance or recommendations on how to deal with it.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP Analytics Cloud - Prevent data entry when having read access
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m looking in SAP Analytics Cloud planning for a way to make rows in a table read-only based on Data Access Controls.

Currently, users who, for example, have Read access on an Opportunity can enter values but cannot publish them. The input of values should also be prevented.

I’ve attached an example as a screenshot.

Styling rules don’t help us, because the upload of users into the read and write columns of the public dimensions is too dynamic.

Is there another option?

Thanks a lot & best regards,

Sebastian

entry.title: How to Calculate Period-Wise Differences for Margins in SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC)
entry.content:
Hi,

I’m working in SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) and need help calculating the period-wise difference for margins.

For example, I have aggregated current margin values for each month (Jan–Sept 2025). I want to calculate the difference between each period, like the “Period Wise” row shown below (e.g., Feb – Jan, Mar – Feb, etc.).

Could someone please guide me on how to achieve this in SAC

entry.title: passing prompt values from a story to a data insight
entry.content:
Hi all,

I don't know if I'm overcomplicating things, but I can't for the life of me get a working script to pass variable values from a story to an insight.
The story consumes a live model using the same BW query as the Data Insight - ergo the prompts are identical.
I simply want script in a button that will launch the Insight and pass the calendar prompt values to the insight....
Needs to be dynamic as the story prompt values obviously may change at each refresh.

Any help much appreciated as I fear I'm going down complex script rabbit holes.

entry.title: SAC schedule publication in specific language
entry.content:
Hi,

I want to create a weekly scheduled publication from SAC for the sales offices in different languages as a PDF. Unfortunately, the only solution I’ve found so far, is to manually change my SAC profile language at the time of publication

Is there a way to predefine the language for each scheduled publication, without having to switch between German, English, and Spanish manually every time?

Best regards,
Andy

entry.title: API financial plan data SAP_COM_0087 -> is SAC licence required or not?
entry.content:
We are on s4hana public cloud

we need to activate SAP_COM_0087 for the workflow budget approval  https://api.sap.com/package/sap.build.pa.content.projectbudgetapproval/overview

for this template we dont have any mention to SAC, but we need to activate communication scenario SAP_COM_0087 ( that has SAC on description )

SAP_COM_0087 is not avaiable, to be avaiable we need to activate  Scope Item 1YB , that agains is pointing to SAC  -> sap notes https://me.sap.com/notes/3387377/E

and scope item 1yb says SAC is required

Can we activate 1yb without SAC licence and set up the SAP_COM_0087?

this link also says we dont need sac https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-q-a/api-to-write-planning-data/qaq-p/12765826
we send the question also to SAP contact but answer is not clear

entry.title: Unable to trigger planning sequence through Scripts(Button) in SAC Planning
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I'm having input template once data it is saved it need to run planning sequence.

I have created a button and written the code, but its failing can anyone help on this or provide alternate code

1) Planning sequence has 4 mandatory variables.

2) As soon as the user open the input template, user fill the variables that need to save in placeholder, once it is saved sequentially it need to trigger the planning sequence

Below is the code which I'm trying

Below is the place holder holding user feeded values in below for 4 variables

Moving Unique ProfitCneter to Unique_PC array
 for (var a = 0; a < MS1.length; a++) {
 if (! Unique_MS1.includes(MS1[a])) {
 Unique_MS1.push(MS1[a]).
 }
 }

// //Moving Unique mpFlag to Unique_RF1 array
 for (var b = 0; b < VER.length; b++) {
if (!Unique_VER.includes(VER[b])) {
Unique_VER.push(VER[b]).
 }
 }

// //Moving Unique Hour to Unique_RlH array
 for (var c = 0; c < CC.length; c++) {
 if (!Unique_CC.includes(CC[c])) {
 Unique_CC.push(CC[c]).
}
 }

// //Moving Unique Fiscper to Unique_FPER1 array
 for (var d = 0; d < CCO.length; d++) {
 if (!Unique_CCO.includes(CCO[d])) {
 Unique_CCO.push(CCO[d]);
 }
 }

 

 PS_1.getBpcPlanningSequenceDataSource().setVariableValue("Z4CCINX02_MSTARTEND",{values:Unique_PC});
 PS_1.getBpcPlanningSequenceDataSource().setVariableValue("Z4CISNY02_VERSIONWVC",{values:Unique_RF1});
 PS_1.getBpcPlanningSequenceDataSource().setVariableValue("Z4NIMMN01_COSTCTR",{values:Unique_RIH});
 PS_1.getBpcPlanningSequenceDataSource().setVariableValue("Z4NIMMN01_COMPCODE",{values:Unique_FPER1});


 var publicVersion = Table_1.getPlanning().getPublicVersion("All Versions");

 if (publicVersion.isDirty())
 {
 PS_1.execute();
 publicVersion.publish();
 }

 

Please do the needful, 

Thanks, and regards!

@Sac

entry.title: SAC Live reports are not working in incognito mode for Edge and Chrome
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are facing issue where all our BW live reports are not working in Incognito Mode. This is the case in Edge and Chrome both. We see this could be due to the browser configuration changes. Mostly due to 3rd party cookies being blocked in Incognito mode.

As the browser configuration is managed at Organization level, it is difficult to things unblocked.

Any idea how to overcome this situation?

 

Regards,

Sayed
